import React from 'react' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const Cart = (props) => { const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext) const totalAmount = `$${cartCtx.totalAmount.toFixed(2)}` const cartItems =
    {cartCtx.items.map((item) =>
  • {item.name}
    • )}
return ( {cartItems}
Total Amount {totalAmount}
) } export default Cart
